text: Psalm 118
Praise to God for His Loyal Love
Give thanks to Yahweh for \add he is\add* good,
for his loyal love \add is\add* forever.
Let Israel say,
“His loyal love \add is\add* forever.”
Let the house of Aaron say,
“His loyal love \add is\add* forever.”
Let \add those who\add* fear Yahweh say,
“His loyal love \add is\add* forever.”
Out of \add my\add* distress I called to Yah.\f + \fr 118:5 \ft A shortened form of “Yahweh” \f*
Yah answered me, \add setting me\add* in a broad place.
Yahweh \add is\add* for me; I do not fear.
What can \add mere\add* humans\f + \fr 118:6 \ft Or “humankind” \f* do to me?
Yahweh \add is\add* for me as my helper,
and \add so\add* I will look \add in triumph\add* on those who hate me.
\add It is\add* better to take refuge in Yahweh
than to trust in humans.\f + \fr 118:8 \ft Or “humankind” \f*
\add It is\add* better to take refuge in Yahweh
than to trust princes.
All nations surrounded me.
In the name of Yahweh I opposed them indeed.
They surrounded me; yes, they surrounded me.
In the name of Yahweh I opposed them indeed.
They surrounded me like bees;
they were extinguished like a fire of thorns.
In the name of Yahweh I opposed them indeed.
You pushed me hard\f + \fr 118:13 \ft Hebrew intensive “pushing, you pushed me” \f* to \add make me\add* fall,
but Yahweh helped me.
Yah\f + \fr 118:14 \ft A shortened form of “Yahweh” \f* \add is\add* my strength and \add my\add* song,\f + \fr 118:14 \ft Or “\fq my \ft might” \f*
and he has become my salvation.\f + \fr 118:14 \ft Or “victory” \f*
\add The\add* sound of rejoicing and salvation\f + \fr 118:15 \ft Or “victory” \f*
\add is\add* in \add the\add* tents of \add the\add* righteous;
the right hand of Yahweh \add has\add* done valiantly.
The right hand of Yahweh \add has\add* exalted;
the right hand of Yahweh \add has\add* done valiantly.
I will not die but live,
and tell of the works of Yah.\f + \fr 118:17 \ft A shortened form of “Yahweh” \f*
Yah has disciplined me severely,
but he did not consign\f + \fr 118:18 \ft Hebrew “give” \f* me to death.
Open to me \add the\add* gates of righteousness,
that I may enter through them
\add and\add* give thanks to Yah.\f + \fr 118:19 \ft A shortened form of “Yahweh” \f*
This \add is\add* the gate of Yahweh,
through \add which the\add* righteous will enter.
I will give thanks \add to\add* you for you have answered me,
and you have become my salvation.\f + \fr 118:21 \ft Or “victory” \f*
\add The\add* stone the builders rejected
has become \add the\add* chief cornerstone.
This is from Yahweh;
it is wonderful in our eyes.
This \add is\add* the day Yahweh has worked;\f + \fr 118:24 \ft Or “made” \f*
let us rejoice and be glad in him.\f + \fr 118:24 \ft Or “in it” \f*
O Yahweh, please save;
O Yahweh, please grant success.
Blessed \add is\add* he who comes in the name of Yahweh.
We bless you\f + \fr 118:26 \ft Hebrew plural \f* from the house\f + \fr 118:26 \ft Or “temple” \f* of Yahweh.
Yahweh is God, and he has given us light.\f + \fr 118:27 \ft Or “made \fq his \ft light to shine upon \fq to \ft us” \f*
Bind \add the\add* festal sacrifice\f + \fr 118:27 \ft Or “festal procession” \f* with cords\f + \fr 118:27 \ft Or “branches” \f*
to the horns\f + \fr 118:27 \ft Or “\fq and lead up \ft to the horns” \f* of the altar.
You \add are\add* my God, and I will give thanks to you.
\add You are\add* my God; I will exalt you.
Give thanks to Yahweh for \add he is\add* good,
for his loyal love \add is\add* forever.
